00044   struct ChannelColor{
00045     int channelId;
00046     QColor color;
00047     QColor groupColor;

00049 
00050     ChannelColor(int id,QColor c,QColor gc,QColor gdc){
00051       channelId = id;
00052       color = c;
00053       groupColor = gc;
00054       spikeGroupColor = gdc;
00055     }
00056       
00057     ChannelColor(const ChannelColor& origin):channelId(origin.channelId),
00058                            color(origin.color),groupColor(origin.groupColor),spikeGroupColor(origin.spikeGroupColor){};
00059     ~ChannelColor(){};
00060   };
